attributes.action: strongly support disused and underused airfields being considered as "brownfield" sites for redevelopment purposes in accordance with a new planning policy statement from the Department for Communities and Local Government (DCLG).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disused and underused airfields constitute a vastly underutilised resource which could go a long way to solving the problems of our housing shortage.
